alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 1:22PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Northampton, southeastern Greensville and southwestern Southampton Counties and the City of Emporia through 145 PM EST... At 121 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Seaboard, or near Garysburg, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Garysburg, Dahlia, Seaboard, Claresville, Green Plain, Adams Grove, Lanes Corner, Bryants Corner, Pleasant Grove, Pleasant Hill, Margarettsville, Gumberry, Little Texas and Emporia Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for northeastern North Carolina...and southeastern Virginia.
